name: places/ChIJ80_1ICf2wokRoKC5Fh2SIJQ
formattedAddress: 808 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 808 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
Wow! The team at Columbus Square has gone above and beyond to help us make a seamless transition into our wonderful home. Shaina Yasin was the most amazing leasing consultant I've ever had. Her attention to detail and care for us were at a level of luxury retail stores! We could not be more grateful to Shaina and the team for helping us go from being apartment-less to moving into our dream apartment in less than 1 week!

If you are considering making a move on the upper westside, reach out to Shaina and the team at Columbus Square - you'll be so glad you did!

originalText.text: The best apartment & management. No amenities fees, super fast elevators, and nice people. You have trader joe’s, wholefoods, target, and a cool liquor shop nearby. The neighbors are all so nice and respect each other.

text.text: The best apartment & management. No amenities fees, super fast elevators, and nice people. You have trader joe’s, wholefoods, target, and a cool liquor shop nearby. The neighbors are all so nice and respect each other.

originalText.text: Great leasing agent, excellent staff and maintenance. My husband and I spent 8 months staying at Columbus Square and it has been a great and memorable experience. The apartment was super clean and well maintained. The pool is open for all tenants living in the building.

text.text: Great leasing agent, excellent staff and maintenance. My husband and I spent 8 months staying at Columbus Square and it has been a great and memorable experience. The apartment was super clean and well maintained. The pool is open for all tenants living in the building.

originalText.text: My boyfriend and I moved into 805 about a year ago as first time New Yorkers and we only have good things to say about it. First of all, we could not believe how QUIET it is. We have never heard the neighbors beside us, despite both of them having dogs,  and rarely have heard the ones above us. The maintenance is SO fast to come fix any problems (they will even come at 9pm). All the employees are so friendly and nice. The gym is a great bonus as well as the terrace area. The location is perfect, close to the park and grocery stores, 1/2/3 and B/C trains. Potentially the only downside is that you are not super close to restaurants/bars, but it is walkable or a few stops on the train. If we weren't moving to a different city for our jobs, we would definitely be staying here. Best apartment I've ever lived in!

originalText.text:
Best apartment in this area.

Apartment itself is very good. It has really big rooms and a beautiful kitchen. The building itself has all the amenities you need, including 24 hour doorman and a outdoor garden.

And I also love the staffs here. Sanger from the leasing office was extremely friendly and helpful. He was extremely helpful and he made my application went through in only one day. Doorman greats to me every time I pass the front desk. Handymen fixed door within two hours of the ticket submission.

I have visited over 10 different apartments near the University and Columbia Square is clearly the best one. Glad I chose to live here.
